thread.section_title: Hotel Royal Saint Michel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel, excellent location, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel, excellent location, friendly staff - Review of Hotel Royal Saint Michel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jrodge_514511
title: Excellent hotel, excellent location, friendly staff
text: Located on the left bank within easy walking distance of the Louvre, Notre Dam and many other museums. Walking through the neighbouring narrow streets is interesting with many cafes and restaurants. A lovely part of Paris and I look forward to my next visit.
